name: Escape From Complex 32
description:
Escape from Complex 32 is a vertically scrolling endless action game for the Playdate!

Use the crank to control a giant laser to shoot yourself up and dodge obstacles. 

Play as a little sentient robot trying to escape the complex you were created in - Complex 32! Try to get as high as you can in this fast paced skill-based game!

Controls

Crank - Change angle of laser gun

Up, A, or B - Shoot the laser

Check out how I made this game in these videos!
